title: A faint ripple in the ether
description: A faint ripple in the ether leads to the Clay Island Loop Trail, where the air itself holds secrets. Your task is deceptively simple: at the heart of this compacted path, you must throw a paper airplane. Let its silent flight be a declaration, a whispered message to forces unseen.

trailLocation.title: Clay Island Loop Trail
trailLocation.description: A walking trail offering outdoor recreation opportunities. Features compacted surface.
